get.summary:
Clean JSON addresses list for React.
Supports simple search via `q`, pagination via `per_page`, and optional sorting

Get zones/addresses for dropdown/select components.
Returns all zones without pagination, optimized for React select dropdowns.
GET: /api/admin/addresses/zones

enum: These credentials do not match our records.

get.summary:
Clean JSON bundles list for React.
Supports simple search via `q`, sorting, and pagination

Clean JSON credits list for React admin UI.
Supports unified `q` search and `type` filter across credits and invoices

Clean JSON credit cards list for React admin UI.
Matches legacy web endpoint `credits/credits-cards-list` but returns a paginated JSON.
Supports unified `q` search, optional `type` filter, date range, and sorting

post.description:
Mirrors legacy dashboard CreditsController@store but returns clean JSON
instead of a redirect.
post.summary: Add a new credit/debit entry for a customer (Customer profile – Credit tab)

get.summary:
Operations summary for dashboard cards.
Aggregates: active lockers, orders by status, active recurring customers.
Supports optional `from_date`, `to_date` (YYYY-MM-DD), and `y_type|type` filters

Finance summary for dashboard cards.
Aggregates total amounts for Topup, Credit_Card, and Credit (credit-only positive amounts).
Supports optional `from_date`, `to_date` (YYYY-MM-DD), and `y_type|type` filters

Unified summary endpoint returning 10 metrics in one payload.
Optional `flag` can be: `all` (default), `operations`, or `finance`.
Supports `from_date`, `to_date` (YYYY-MM-DD), and `y_type|type` filters
List invoices for Admin UI/React with unified `q` search

Clean JSON items list for React.
Path: admin/items/items-list
Supports unified simple search via `q`, optional sorting and pagination

Clean JSON lockers list for React.
Supports unified `q` search and sortable columns

Get all customers without lockers for locker creation/editing.
Used in React form dropdowns

Get form data needed for creating a new locker.
Returns customers, zones, statuses, and a new unique code

Get form data for editing an existing locker.
Includes the locker details plus customers, zones, and statuses

Get a single locker's details for editing.
Returns complete locker information including user and zone

delete.summary: Remove the specified locker from storage

get.summary:
Get filters data for the Geolocation page.
Returns zones, drivers, customer status options, and days options

Get orders for the Geolocation list view.
Supports filtering by zones, drivers, status, and days

Get map data for the Geolocation map view.
Returns lockers with their location and icon colors

post.summary:
Specify a custom location to focus the map on.
Validates and returns the location data

get.summary:
Clean JSON messages list for React.
Supports simple search via `q`, pagination via `per_page`, and optional sorting.
Matches legacy naming: path `messages/messages-list` and method `messagesList`

post.summary:
Store and dispatch a message (SMS or push) to selected customers.
Mirrors legacy dashboard store() but returns clean JSON for React

get.summary: Lightweight customers list for message picker (id, name, mobile) with simple search

Clean JSON list for React: promos list with filters and simple search.
Query params supported:
- per_page: integer (default 25)
- q: string (search in name, code)
- status: enum('Pending','Active','Inactive')
- from_date: date (filter by created_at >= from_date)
- to_date: date (filter by created_at <= to_date)

parameters.name: start_from_date
parameters.description: Optional filters for promo date ranges

200.description: No heavy transform needed; expose clean attributes

get.summary:
Return assignees and customers for a given ticket type.
Intended for dynamic dropdown updates when type changes

Clean JSON tickets list for React.
Matches legacy path shape `tickets/tickets-list/{page_size}` and adds `q` search + `status` filter

Create form data for tickets (types, statuses, assignees, customers).
Mirrors TicketController@create but returns clean JSON

post.summary:
Store a newly created Ticket (JSON API).
Mirrors TicketController@store behavior

get.summary:
Clean JSON list for React: topups list with filters and simple search.
Query params supported:
- per_page: integer (default 25)
- q: string (search in number, customer name, staff name)
- status: enum('New','Requested','Used')
- from_date: date (filter by created_at >= from_date)
- to_date: date (filter by created_at <= to_date)
- from_charge_date: date (filter by charge_date >= from_charge_date)
- to_charge_date: date (filter by charge_date <= to_charge_date)
- sort: one of [number,status,amount,charge_date,created_at,customer_name,staff_name]
- direction: one of [asc, desc]

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Treat null/empty as "not selected"; validate as string but allow nullable

get.summary:
Compute the path for a driver's trip for today.
Matches dashboard endpoint response shape (bare JSON string).
GET: /api/admin/trips/trip-path?user_id=4

Generate a unique trip code for new trip creation.
Returns a bare JSON string (e.g., "A1B2C3") for consistency.
GET: /api/admin/trips/trip-code

Trip details for admin trip details page.
GET: /api/admin/trips/{trip}

All orders associated with a trip (pickup or drop-off).
Supports simple `q` search across code/status/addresses.
GET: /api/admin/trips/{trip}/orders

Trip audits (OwenIt\Auditing), paginated and transformed.
GET: /api/admin/trips/{trip}/audits

List bundle memberships for a specific customer (Bundle tab – audit table).
